items.sentence: Only a few of the passengers were wearing seat belts.
Tom thought that Mary was destined for bigger things.
When he opened the door he had nothing on but the TV.
This road will take you down to the edge of the lake.
That girl's under the delusion that she's a princess.
It looks like rain. You'd better take in the washing.
You'd better hurry because the banks will close soon.
I'd hardly checked into the hotel when Tom called me.
The school doesn't allow students to smoke on campus.
You should pack a couple of extra changes of clothes.
You can't just go out and buy a replacement for this.
Why did I have to fall in love with a woman like you?
I suspect that Tom and Mary have already left Boston.
Tom always eats breakfast, but Mary hardly ever does.
Tom didn't seem to be as scared as Mary seemed to be.
Tom has already taken Mary's suitcase out to the car.
Tom stared out of the window, watching the snow fall.
Tom told me that he didn't remember Mary's last name.
I'm scared of what others will do to me if I do that.
All humanity will suffer if a nuclear war breaks out.
